WildFly Elytron Parent 2.0.0.Final
  • All Classes
 

Uses of Package
org.wildfly.security

  • Packages that use org.wildfly.security 
    Package Description
    org.wildfly.security
    WildFly security base package.
    org.wildfly.security.auth.client
    Elytron Client enable remote clients to authenticate using Elytron.
    org.wildfly.security.auth.server
    Server side of authentication provided by Elytron.
    org.wildfly.security.auth.util
    Miscellaneous utility classes and APIs for client and server login applications.
    org.wildfly.security.credential.source  
    org.wildfly.security.credential.store
    Package for Credential Store API/SPI classes and interfaces.
    org.wildfly.security.key  
    org.wildfly.security.manager
    The WildFly security manager implementation and supporting utilities.
    org.wildfly.security.mechanism.gssapi  
    org.wildfly.security.password
    Packages and files for handling text passwords and their various encoding strategies.
    org.wildfly.security.ssl  
  • Classes in org.wildfly.security used by org.wildfly.security 
    Class Description
    EmptyProvider
    The singleton empty provider.
    NullSecurityFactory
    A SecurityFactory implementation which returns null every time.
    SecurityFactory
    A factory for preconfigured security objects.
    VersionedProvider
    A security provider which uses a string version, forward compatible with Java 9.
    WildFlyElytronBaseProvider
    The base Provider implementation for security services made available by Elytron.
    WildFlyElytronDigestProvider
    Deprecated.
    Use org.wildfly.security.digest.WildFlyElytronDigestProvider instead
    WildFlyElytronHttpBasicProvider
    Deprecated.
    Use org.wildfly.security.http.basic.WildFlyElytronHttpBasicProvider instead
    WildFlyElytronHttpBearerProvider
    Deprecated.
    use org.wildfly.security.http.bearer.WildFlyElytronHttpBearerProvider instead
    WildFlyElytronHttpClientCertProvider
    Deprecated.
    Use org.wildfly.security.http.cert.WildFlyElytronHttpClientCertProvider
    WildFlyElytronHttpDigestProvider
    Deprecated.
    Use org.wildfly.security.http.digest.WildFlyElytronHttpDigestProvider instead
    WildFlyElytronHttpFormProvider
    Deprecated.
    Use org.wildfly.security.http.form.WildFlyElytronHttpFormProvider instead
    WildFlyElytronHttpSpnegoProvider
    Deprecated.
    use org.wildfly.security.http.spnego.WildFlyElytronHttpSpnegoProvider instead
  • Classes in org.wildfly.security used by org.wildfly.security.auth.client 
    Class Description

    A privileged action which accepts a parameter.
    ParametricPrivilegedExceptionAction
    A privileged action which accepts a parameter and can throw an exception.
